function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High variability in time between arrivals","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding and longer wait times for patients","Mitigation":"Implement scheduling system to manage patient arrivals and optimize resource allocation","Technologies":"Scheduling software, data analytics for demand prediction","People":"Medical staff, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Unbalanced integration of different types of resources","Impact":"Inefficient system and potential bottlenecks in patient care","Mitigation":"Conduct resource optimization analysis to identify the optimal mix of medical and non-medical personnel","Technologies":"Simulation modeling, sensitivity analysis, resource allocation algorithms","People":"Research team, healthcare facility management","Owner":"Research team, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Overcrowding and bottleneck due to excessive number of doctors","Impact":"Medical staff overwhelmed, delays in patient care, increased risk of errors","Mitigation":"Optimize the number of doctors based on other resources and patient demand","Technologies":"Simulation modeling, sensitivity analysis, resource allocation algorithms","People":"Medical staff, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
